messages.title: Local family give Denis the thumbs up
messages.content: "Denis is always helpful," says local resident Richard...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will press local employers to put people living in Rotherham first when it comes to filling vacancies.
I will always promote our top class hospitals, and campaign for better cancer care, even shorter waiting times and more doctors and nurses.
I will support all measures to tackle abuses of our immigration and asylum system.
I have vigorously campaigned against ANY attempts to lift the ban on hunting with dogs.
I will support measures to combat climate change.

issues.economy: A Labour Government will work all out to: Secure the recovery, Raise living standards, Build a high tech economy
issues.environment: I will support measures to combat climate change.
issues.governance: A Labour Government will: Protect frontline services, Strengthen fairness in communities
issues.health: I will always promote our top class hospitals, and campaign for better cancer care, even shorter waiting times and more doctors and nurses.
issues.immigration: I will support all measures to tackle abuses of our immigration and asylum system.

leaflet.personalStatement: Times have been tough for Rotherham people as a result of the global economic crisis. We in the Labour Party want a future where people are given the opportunity to get on, not just get by.

endorsements.endorsement: "Denis is always helpful," says local resident Richard...

images.caption: Denis MacShane with a sign saying 'I [heart] ROTHERHAM'

leaflet.additionalNotes: A Labour Government will work all out to: Secure the recovery, Raise living standards, Build a high tech economy, Protect frontline services, Strengthen fairness in communities
